targets.query:
SELECT sum(value)
FROM (
  SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("count"), 1s) AS value
  FROM "source_count"
  WHERE process =~ /^$processName$/ AND env = '$env' AND $timeFilter
  GROUP BY time($__interval), process, slot
)
GROUP BY time($__interval), process

SELECT sum(value)
FROM (
  SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("count"), 1s) AS value
  FROM "end_count"
  WHERE process =~ /^$processName$/ AND env = '$env' AND $timeFilter
  GROUP BY time($__interval), process, nodeId, slot
)
GROUP BY time($__interval), process, nodeId

SELECT sum(value)
FROM (
  SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("count"), 1s) AS value
  FROM "dead_end_count"
  WHERE process =~ /^$processName$/ AND env = '$env' AND $timeFilter
  GROUP BY time($__interval), process, nodeId, slot
)
GROUP BY time($__interval), process, nodeId
SELECT max("p50") FROM "service_OK_histogram" WHERE "process" =~ /$processName$/ AND "env" =~ /^$env$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "process", "serviceName" fill(null)
SELECT max("p99") FROM "service_OK_histogram" WHERE "process" =~ /$processName$/ AND "env" =~ /^$env$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "process", "serviceName" fill(null)

SELECT sum(mean)
FROM (
  SELECT mean(value)
  FROM "service_OK_instantRate"
  WHERE process =~ /^$processName$/ AND env = '$env'
  GROUP BY time($__interval), process, serviceName, slot
)
WHERE $timeFilter
GROUP BY time($__interval), process, serviceName
SELECT max("p50") FROM "service_FAIL_histogram" WHERE "process" =~ /$processName$/ AND "env" =~ /^$env$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "process", "serviceName" fill(null)
SELECT max("p99") FROM "service_FAIL_histogram" WHERE "process" =~ /$processName$/ AND "env" =~ /^$env$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "process", "serviceName" fill(null)

SELECT sum(mean)
FROM (
  SELECT mean(value)
  FROM "service_FAIL_instantRate"
  WHERE process =~ /^$processName$/ AND env = '$env'
  GROUP BY time($__interval), process, serviceName, slot
)
WHERE $timeFilter
GROUP BY time($__interval), serviceName, action

SELECT sum(value)
FROM (
  SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("count"), 1s) AS value
  FROM "error_instantRateByNode_count"
  WHERE process =~ /^$processName$/ AND env = '$env' AND $timeFilter
  GROUP BY time($__interval), process, slot
)
GROUP BY time($__interval), process, nodeId

panels.description:
IMPORTANT. 
This metric does NOT show the overall lag on Kafka source; a largest lag among all the source partitions is shown.

targets.query: SELECT max("value") FROM "records-lag-max" WHERE "host" =~ /$hosts$/ AND "process" =~ /$processName$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "process" fill(none)

panels.title: Max lag among Kafka source partitions (events)

targets.query: SELECT min("min") FROM "eventtimedelay_histogram" WHERE "host" =~ /$hosts$/ AND "process" =~ /$processName$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "process" fill(null)
SELECT mean("p50") FROM "eventtimedelay_histogram" WHERE "host" =~ /$hosts$/ AND "process" =~ /$processName$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "process" fill(null)
SELECT max("max") FROM "eventtimedelay_histogram" WHERE "host" =~ /$hosts$/ AND "process" =~ /$processName$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "process" fill(null)
SELECT min("value") FROM "eventtimedelay_histogram" WHERE "host" =~ /$hosts$/ AND "process" =~ /$processName$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "process" fill(null)

list.name: processName
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "source_instantRate" WITH KEY = "process"

list.name: env
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "source_instantRate" WITH KEY = "env"
